titleStmt.title: Synoptic edition ofHeinrich von Kemptenby Konrad von Würzburg
HvK
titleStmt.author: Gustavo Fernandez Riva

publicationStmt.p: Created by Gustavo Fernández Riva as part of the PhD in Medieval Studies at the University of Buenos Aires (Argentina) from 2014 to 2018. It is published under the Creative Commons 4.0 Attribution Licence (CC BY 4.0).

history.p: Früher Privatbesitz August Closs; davor Privatbesitz Robert Priebsch

encodingDesc.p: Only changes to the guide manuscript (P) are signaled.

note.seg: El copista de K, que toma como base a P, se da cuenta de que aquí falta el sujeto y lo completa, incorrectamente, con künic.
